name: Dangerous Machine Type-6
text:
During each of your Standby Phases: Roll a six-sided die and apply the result.
â—? 1: Discard 1 card.
â—? 2: Your opponent discards 1 card.
â—? 3: Draw 1 card.
â—? 4: Your opponent draws 1 card.
â—? 5: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
â—? 6: Destroy this card.
